content:
Mobai just gave me some important supplies.
What was it? Hmm...
Talk to Mobai yourself, and you'll find out.

When you're mentally exhausted, your body always knows before you do.

It's amazing - like how the starlight on my tail... has gotten dimmer!

I knew it was time for a nap.

Don't overwork yourself, okay?

Mobai and Sani would worry about you.
